title: Melvindale- Beautiful 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Unit Available Now!
posting_body: ['Come view this beautifully updated and modern, 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment!', 'This unit boasts modern white cabinets, granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances in the kitchen, and subway tiling.', 'This spacious apartment is located in the beautiful Melvindale Square Apartment complex which features on-site laundry and off-street parking.', 'Conveniently located on a quiet street in Melvindale.', 'Sorry, no pets.', 'Apartment Features:', '-1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom', '-Modern Kitchen with White Cabinets, Subway Tiling, & Granite Countertops', '-Stainless-Steel Appliances Include: Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Oven, & Microwave', '-Hardwood Floors', '-On-site Laundry', '-Off-street Parking', 'Available Now!!', '$895 Monthly Rent', '$895 Security Deposit', 'For more information or to schedule an appointment for showing call', 'show contact info', '.', 'Also enjoy features such as online rent payment, online maintenance requests, and online applications.', 'Thank you for your interest!', 'Cities close by Dearborn, Dearborn Heights, Allen Park, Lincoln Park, & Taylor.']
